cmt3319.littleminesweeper

Class MainMenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmt3319.framework.Screen
      • cmt3319.littleminesweeper.MainMenuScreen

  • public class MainMenuScreen
extends cmt3319.framework.Screen
    Displays main menu of the game. Can start game, select difficulity or go to leaderboard.
